testing.name: Resettlement and Ukrainian emigration in the second half of XIX - early XX century.

question.text: What has caused massive labor emigration Ukrainian late nineteenth century.?

answer.text: Striving to Russian and Austrian governments to get rid of the Ukrainian population
Undeveloped urban life in the Ukrainian lands
Ageless desire for new adventures and discoveries

question.text: What were the name of the earth, mastered Ukrainian in the Far East?
To which of these countries Ukrainian settlers came first?
Which of these countries the Ukrainian community at the beginning of the twentieth century. was the largest?
From which regions of Ukraine prevailed in labor emigration to the West?
What year is the beginning of Ukrainian labor migration?
